This is the personal website of Boya Guo. Boya is a second year Epidemiology MPH student at Columbia University. She graduated from Emory Univeristy in 2017 and had a BS degree in Biology and a BA degree in Human Health. She is interested in cancer epidemiology research and dedicated to continue her research in breast cancer and nutrition.
